commands.description: Adds a specified number of hours to the current time. This can be useful for triggering server events that require a certain amount of time to pass. 'int' is a whole number representing hours.
Enables or disables time progression on the server. Use '0' to stop and '1' to start the day/night cycle.
Sets the time to the specified hour using a 24-hour clock format. This can be used to directly control the server's time.
